meanings: (차라리) rather (than), sooner (than), preferably, (반대로) on the contrary, instead

phrases.phrase: 불행을 바꾸어 오히려 복이 되게 하다

meanings: 실용회화-처음 만났을 때 The pleasure is mine.

vlive.korean: 오히려? Rather than relieving? 듣기 View video FTISLAND : [REPLAY] FTISLAND TRUE NIGHT LIVE [Take Me Now]
[멋있는 옷 말고!] 이건 오히려 멋있게 입으면 안 될 것 같은... [Not cool clothes!] Rather than wearing something cool... 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 13. 강력한 두 우승후보 학교가 벌써 붙는다고!? 경희대 래빈 VS 서울대 트리플에이치
vlive.english: [Not cool clothes!] Rather than wearing something cool...

vlive.korean: 왜냐면 아기 때는 오히려 더 사납게? 무섭게 생겼다고 해야 되나? When I was a baby, it made me look sharp? It made me look scary? 듣기 View video ITZY : 🖤
vlive.english: When I was a baby, it made me look sharp? It made me look scary?

vlive.korean: '보고 싶다'가 오히려... "I miss you" could be... 듣기 View video 심포유 - my SMTelevision : [심포유 #첸] EP18 #천생사랑꾼 #뜻밖의공통점 #사람잡는두성

examples.korean: Paying children too much attention when they misbehave can be self-defeating. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아이들이 버릇없이 굴 때 너무 많은 관심을 보이면 오히려 더 골치 아파진다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Paying children too much attention when they misbehave can be self-defeating. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She’s not thin—if anything she’s on the plump side. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 여위지 않아. 오히려 통통한 편이야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She’s not thin—if anything she’s on the plump side. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He believes the figure should be more like $10 million. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그 수치가 오히려 천만 달러에 가까울 것이라고 믿는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He believes the figure should be more like $10 million. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘Is it better now?’ ‘Quite the opposite, I’m afraid.’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “그게 이제 나아졌니?” “오히려 그 반대인 것 같애.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Is it better now?’ ‘Quite the opposite, I’m afraid.’ Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It wasn’t easy to persuade her to come—quite the reverse. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀를 오라고 설득하는 것이 쉽지 않았다. 오히려 그 반대였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It wasn’t easy to persuade her to come—quite the reverse. Add to Wordbook
